EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2014 - 2014.09.18.Final Confirmation Email for Registrants
EmailTemplate.subject: Tricentis Accelerate 2014 - See you there
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate>
Dear Tricentis Customers and Partners,
Accelerate 2014 is almost here. Take this chance to download the agenda <http://www.tricentis.com/sites/default/files/images/about/events/tricentis_accelerate/accelerate_agenda_2014.pdf> to your preferred device.
Tricentis Accelerate 2014 Thursday, September 18, 2014 Hotel InterContinental Vienna, Johannesgasse 28, 1030 Vienna, Austria from 9:15 a.m. till 7:00 p.m.
To view the updated agenda and learn more about the event, click here: accelerate.tricentis.com <http://accelerate.tricentis.com>
We are looking forward to seeing you there.
Best wishes and safe travels,
Wolfgang Platz Founder & Chief Product Officer Tricentis
Franz Fuchsberger Co-Founder & Chief Sales Officer Tricentis
To learn more, visit http://www.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/?> or follow us on LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/tricentis-technology-&-consulting-gmbh>, Twitter <https://twitter.com/tricentis> or Facebook <https://www.facebook.com/TRICENTIS>.
